tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_compensation (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    position VARCHAR(100),
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
    bonus DECIMAL(7, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    salary DECIMAL
);
CREATE TABLE employee ( employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), position VARCHAR(50), department VARCHAR(50), salary DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE salary_band ( band_id INT PRIMARY KEY, lower_limit DECIMAL(10, 2), upper_limit DECIMAL(10, 2), description VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE performance_review ( review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT, year INT, performance_rating DECIMAL(3, 1), comments TEXT );
CREATE TABLE salary_history ( history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT, salary DECIMAL(10, 2), effective_date DATE );
